1.instruction:
[ETL 재실행(서비스 롤 키 사용) + PERM_CHECK]
- 목적: RLS를 우회 가능한 service_role 키로 ETL을 재실행하여 업서트 성공을 보장하고, 프론트엔드 관점에서는 anon 키로 권한 상태를 진단(PERM_CHECK)합니다.
- 프로젝트 루트: /workspace/jeju-travel-planner
- 입력 파일: /workspace/uploads/jeju.txt
- Supabase 설정:
  · URL: https://gfhtoiqsvrqbwzshjxgs.supabase.co
  · ANON: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6ImdmaHRvaXFzdnJxYnd6c2hqeGdzIiwicm9zZSI6ImFub24iLCJpYXQiOjE3NTc5MjYxNTIsImV4cCI6MjA3MzUwMjE1Mn0.5b9peKSBr9MQcODRfppwZriSomGEdhs6kvD6BLCVL04
  · SERVICE_ROLE(비공개, ETL에서만 사용): eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6ImdmaHRvaXFzdnJxYnd6c2hqeGdzIiwicm9zZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc1NzkyNjE1MiwiZXhwIjoyMDczNTAyMTUyfQ.JvW0BNk1YWxtW3F7egAOKqnzta67s9ML-ocHq8otSOE

필수 산출물(갱신 포함):
- /workspace/jeju-travel-planner/supabase/seed/from_jeju_txt.json
- /workspace/jeju-travel-planner/logs/etl_validation.log
- /workspace/jeju-travel-planner/scripts/etl_from_jeju_txt.mjs (서비스 키 지원으로 보강)

수행 절차:
1) 스크립트 보강: /workspace/jeju-travel-planner/scripts/etl_from_jeju_txt.mjs
   - 두 개의 클라이언트를 생성하도록 수정
     const url = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL;
     const anon = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY;
     const svc = process.env.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE;
     const supabaseSvc = createClient(url, svc, { auth: { autoRefreshToken:false, persistSession:false } }); // 업서트 전용
     const supabaseAnon = createClient(url, anon, { auth: { autoRefreshToken:false, persistSession:false } }); // PERM_CHECK 전용
   - ETL 업서트(categories → places → schedules → schedule_places)는 supabaseSvc를 사용
   - PERM_CHECK(select/insert 테스트)는 supabaseAnon을 사용
   - DDL 단계는 실행 시도 대신 “DDL은 Studio에서 적용됨”으로 로그에 기록하고 스킵
   - 로그에 키 값은 절대 노출 금지(마스킹 처리: xxxx... 끝 6자리만)

2) 환경 변수 주입 및 실행
   - .env.local(프론트 전용): NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL, NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY만 기록(서비스 키 기록 금지)
   - 실행 명령(ETL 전용, 셸에서만 주입):
     cd /workspace/jeju-travel-planner && \
     SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6ImdmaHRvaXFzdnJxYnd6c2hqeGdzIiwicm9zZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc1NzkyNjE1MiwiZXhwIjoyMDczNTAyMTUyfQ.JvW0BNk1YWxtW3F7egAOKqnzta67s9ML-ocHq8otSOE \
     NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL=https://gfhtoiqsvrqbwzshjxgs.supabase.co \
     NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6ImdmaHRvaXFzdnJxYnd6c2hqeGdzIiwicm9zZSI6ImFub24iLCJpYXQiOjE3NTc5MjYxNTIsImV4cCI6MjA3MzUwMjE1Mn0.5b9peKSBr9MQcODRfppwZriSomGEdhs6kvD6BLCVL04 \
     node ./scripts/etl_from_jeju_txt.mjs

3) PERM_CHECK(anon 키로)
   - 각 테이블에 대해 select 1건 시도 → status/error 기록
   - places에 대해 insert 더미 1건 시도 후, 성공 시 즉시 delete 롤백
   - etl_validation.log 형식:
     [INFO] step=PERM_CHECK table=places op=select status=200
     [ERROR] step=PERM_CHECK table=places op=insert status=403 error={"code":"PGRST...","message":"...","details":"...","hint":"..."}

4) 보고(이 스레드 회신)
   - 테이블별 업서트 결과(삽입/갱신 가능하면 분리, 아니면 최종 count)
   - PERM_CHECK 결과 표(테이블×select/insert 상태)
   - /workspace/jeju-travel-planner/logs/etl_validation.log 마지막 50줄
   - 특이사항 및 후속 조치 제안
   - 주의: 보고서/로그에 서비스 키 원문은 절대 노출 금지

참고(사용자 선택 반영):
- categories UPDATE 정책을 이후 유지하려면(선택 3.A): Studio → SQL Editor에 아래 예시를 적용하도록 제안
  alter table public.categories enable row level security;
  create policy "categories anon update" on public.categories for update to anon using (true) with check (true);

2.instruction:
[프론트 보안/UX 점검: 서비스 키 비노출 보장 + 403 UX 유지]
- 목적: 서비스 롤 키는 ETL 전용으로만 사용하고, 프론트(브라우저)에서는 anon 키만 사용하도록 강제. 403 시 사용자 안내/로깅 유지.
- 프로젝트 루트: /workspace/jeju-travel-planner
- 파일:
  - /workspace/jeju-travel-planner/lib/supabaseClient.ts
  - /workspace/jeju-travel-planner/components/JejuTravelPlanner.tsx
  - /workspace/jeju-travel-planner/README.md

작업:
1) 보안 가드
   - lib/supabaseClient.ts에서 createClient는 반드시 process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_*만 사용
   - NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY에 “service_role” 문자열이 포함되면 콘솔 에러 출력 후, 모든 네트워크 호출을 중단하고 UI에 경고 배너 표시
   - 서비스 키를 브라우저로 노출하지 않도록 README에 “서비스 키는 오직 ETL 셸 환경변수(SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE)로만 사용” 명시

2) UX/로깅 유지
   - 403/401/409/23503 케이스별 배너/토스트 유지
   - 헬스체크(categories.select('key').limit(1)) 결과를 콘솔에 요약 출력
   - 빌드/런 확인: npm run dev, npm run build

출력:
- 변경 파일 목록과 핵심 변경점 요약
- 빌드/런 결과와 콘솔 로그 요약(스크린샷 대체 텍스트)

1.instruction: Integrate Supabase into the frontend: add @supabase/supabase-js to package.json, create lib/supabaseClient.ts, modify components/JejuTravelPlanner.tsx to load from Supabase with fallback and insert new places to Supabase, update README with Supabase section, and add .env.local.example.

2.instruction: Install dependencies and verify by building and briefly running the dev server. Capture logs and report.

3.instruction: Parse /workspace/uploads/jeju.txt, generate normalized seed JSON and mapping doc, and write schema.sql as provided.

4.instruction: Run ETL: attempt DDL (if possible), upsert categories and insert places into Supabase, then validate counts and samples. Save all logs to /workspace/jeju-travel-planner/logs/etl_validation.log and report results.

5.instruction: Run ETL to upload parsed data to Supabase and validate; then list outputs and include the last 50 lines of the validation log in the report.

ETL-1.instruction: Run ETL with provided Supabase env vars: write schema.sql per spec, execute ETL script to parse /workspace/uploads/jeju.txt, attempt DDL (log errors if any), upsert categories/places/schedules/schedule_places, then verify and log counts/samples. Finally, report outputs and include last 50 lines of etl_validation.log.

ETL-2.instruction: Re-run ETL after DDL and anon policies applied: execute scripts/etl_from_jeju_txt.mjs with provided Supabase env vars, then tail the last 50 lines of logs/etl_validation.log for reporting.

PERM-CHECK-1.instruction: Implement and run Supabase permission diagnostics with anon key, and rerun ETL. Steps: 1) Write scripts/perm_check.mjs to log select/insert/delete permission results for categories, places, schedules, schedule_places into logs/etl_validation.log. 2) Re-run ETL with provided env vars. 3) Execute perm_check.mjs with same env. 4) Tail last 50 lines of logs/etl_validation.log for reporting.

FRONT-LOG-1.instruction: Implement enhanced Supabase error logging and minimal UI banners, add healthcheck on mount, and insert fallback handling in JejuTravelPlanner.tsx; keep/env warnings in supabaseClient.ts. Then verify in dev/build.

RUN-ETL-PERM-REPORT-1.instruction: Re-run ETL with provided Supabase env, then run permission diagnostics and tail the validation log for reporting.

FRONT-UX-403.instruction: Improve frontend UX for 403 Forbidden: strengthen logging in supabaseClient.ts, enhance JejuTravelPlanner.tsx to print error.details/hint, show specific banners for 403/23503/409, and verify build.

RUN-ETL-PERM-REPORT-2.instruction: Re-run ETL with provided Supabase env, then run permission diagnostics (anon) and tail the validation log for reporting.

BLOCKED-ASK-ANON-KEY-1.instruction: Supabase auth failing with 401 Invalid API key. Request the latest anon public key and confirm URL, then proceed to rerun ETL and PERM_CHECK. Ask which RLS approach to apply after auth is restored.

DIAG-401-1.instruction: Verify the provided Supabase anon key by calling REST endpoints via curl (root and a table query). Capture responses to confirm whether 401 persists before proceeding with policy updates and ETL reruns.

ETL-RETRY-AUTH-FIX-1.instruction: After receiving a valid Supabase anon key, update .env.local, rerun ETL (etl_from_jeju_txt.mjs) and PERM_CHECK (perm_check.mjs) with the provided env, then tail etl_validation.log and report results.

ETL-SVC-ANON-1.instruction: Modify ETL to use service_role for upserts and anon for validation; then run ETL with provided env and run PERM_CHECK (anon), finally tail validation log for reporting.

ETL-INSERT-ONLY-RETRY.instruction: Update env with the provided anon key, switch ETL to insert-only mode, run ETL using service_role, then run PERM_CHECK with anon and tail the validation log for reporting.
